channel.title: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map
channel.description:
Hello, when going down to the lower part, to turn on the power I think, when turning around this corner [img='https://i.imgur.com/1Fc5OcB.jpg',left][/img] it starts to load, and once loaded, loads me outside of the map, as shown here. [img='https://i.imgur.com/rR8paut.jpg',left][/img]The console also proceeds to give me this output right afterwards, not sure if it's important, but I'm including it in case it is. Also, despite saying that I'd see a crash, I do not. [quote] No caption found for 'flesh.scraperough' No caption found for 'flesh.scraperough' No caption found for 'flesh.scraperough' ---- Host_Changelevel ---- WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. Loading game from //MOD/save/bm_c1a4d.HL1... ERROR: couldn't open. Loading game from //MOD/save/bm_c1a4b.HL1... WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type! Fix this or you'll see a crash. 2 GodRaysEffect ??Compact freed 2232320 bytes [/quote] Typing status into console gets me this.
(Click to set source) [quote] status
hostname: Black Mesa version : 100003/24 100003 insecure map : bm_c1a4d at: -129 x, 112 y, -16 z tags : players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 1032 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "Listener" STEAM_ID_PENDING 03:16 15 0 active loopback [/quote] And, typing getpos in console gets me this. [quote] ] getpos setpos -106.469093 128.533844 -16.405075;setang -20.045797 84.744453 0.000000 [/quote]

item.title: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map
item.dc:creator: The_Inquisitor
item.description:
RedEye:
The Inquisitor:

Yes I also have this issue I was playing this part when the last update came in, After that I noticed that all NPCs were frozen including the tentacle creature. the game is still playable until you get to that load point. been trying to remedy for 2 weeks now. about the only thing I have not done is start a new game. But I have gone back to a point where nothing is frozen but the issue still returns at that load point.

Here is the simple fix.Go to New Game and restart an unlocked chapter.

You have the AI Disabled glitch, this is caused by new game updates being incompatible with Old saved games.
It is a failing of the Source Engine.

The Steam Black Mesa Community Discussions has several posts on this problem.

Yes this worked for me.
Thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map

item.title: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
The Inquisitor:

Yes I also have this issue I was playing this part when the last update came in, After that I noticed that all NPCs were frozen including the tentacle creature. the game is still playable until you get to that load point. been trying to remedy for 2 weeks now. about the only thing I have not done is start a new game. But I have gone back to a point where nothing is frozen but the issue still returns at that load point.

Here is the simple fix.
Go to New Game and restart an unlocked chapter.

You have the AI Disabled glitch, this is caused by new game updates being incompatible with Old saved games.
It is a failing of the Source Engine.

The Steam Black Mesa Community Discussions has several posts on this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map
item.dc:creator: Spartan_374
item.description:
I came here to find out how to fix the problem, but nowone is commenting. ;(

And your graphics look better than mine. I tried nocliping but it wont work.

Tried a little more exploring with noclip and found where you spawn. ||

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Loads Player Outside Map
item.dc:creator: Listener
item.description:
Hello, when going down to the lower part, to turn on the power I think, when turning around this corner
it starts to load, and once loaded, loads me outside of the map, as shown here.
The console also proceeds to give me this output right afterwards, not sure if it’s important, but I’m including it in case it is. Also, despite saying that I’d see a crash, I do not.

No caption found for ‘flesh.scraperough’
No caption found for ‘flesh.scraperough’
No caption found for ‘flesh.scraperough’
---- Host_Changelevel ----
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
Loading game from //MOD/save/bm_c1a4d.HL1…
ERROR: couldn’t open.
Loading game from //MOD/save/bm_c1a4b.HL1…
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
WARNING! Field mapName is using the wrong FIELD_ type!
Fix this or you’ll see a crash.
2 GodRaysEffect ??Compact freed 2232320 bytes

Typing status into console gets me this.

(Click to set source)

status

hostname: Black Mesa
version : 100003/24 100003 insecure
map : bm_c1a4d at: -129 x, 112 y, -16 z
tags :
players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max)
edicts : 1032 used of 2048 max

userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr

3 “Listener” STEAM_ID_PENDING 03:16 15 0 active loopback

And, typing getpos in console gets me this.

] getpos
setpos -106.469093 128.533844 -16.405075;setang -20.045797 84.744453 0.000000
